titleStmt.title: Theological discourses, in two parts the first containing VIII letters and III sermons concerning the blessed Trinity : the second, discourses & sermons on several occasions / by John Wallis ...
titleStmt.author: Wallis, John, 1616-1703.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect copy: contains only the first two letters.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
